attributes.action: remove the family court and put all cases in normal courts with a jury
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we would like to request that the so called family courts are dispelled with and the cases are put into normal courts with a jury not just 3 judges, 
for along time now many families have long requested that the family courts are opened up, i and many families request that the goverment remove the family courts forthwith because they are a waste of tax payers money, they are very biased on the social services where as if all family cases go through the normal courts with a real jury then it will not be seen to be a waste of money and also it can be seen to be justice served as an average jury has the right and motion to make decisions based on the facts of a case and will see through the falsehood that people can create,
